Class LogEventDiskBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.core.utils.ObjectDiskBuffer<com.here.mobility.sdk.core.log.LogEvent,LogsClient>

  • public class LogEventDiskBuffer
extends ObjectDiskBuffer<com.here.mobility.sdk.core.log.LogEvent,LogsClient>
    A buffer of LogEvent stored on disk, before getting uploaded to the server.
